title: Delirium Syndrome Management in Geriatric Oncology: MOOC-Based Advanced Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical and nursing knowledge, including foundational concepts in oncology or gerontology
context.additional_context: Targeting learners preparing for nursing or healthcare professions, aiming to strengthen practical competencies in geriatric oncology, which requires a multidisciplinary approach

learning_goals: Identify clinical symptoms and diagnostic criteria of delirium syndrome with over 80% accuracy
Present non-pharmacological/pharmacological management strategies applicable to elderly cancer patients by case type
Design interdisciplinary collaboration protocols in 3+ stages based on MOOC content
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
